title: Making governance agile: Exploring the role of artificial intelligence in China’s local governance
research_description: This study examines the deployment of artificial intelligence in local governance in China, exploring how AI facilitates data integration, policy innovation, and public service improvement in Shenzhen.
research_results: AI plays a dual role as both a tool for regulating behaviors and aiding decision-making, improving the agility and efficiency of local governance services. The study identifies four dimensions of AI deployment: data integration, policy innovation, smart application, and collaboration.
future_research: Future research may focus on the long-term impacts of AI deployment on public value creation, particularly in local governance contexts, and its potential for scaling to other regions.
